product_name: Primal Wear Clash Bike Jersey - Men's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: Featuring a slightly relaxed sports cut, the men's Primal Wear Clash Bike Jersey is perfect for club rides, long tours, mountain biking and commuting. Double-knit polyester wicks sweat off your skin and dries fast. UPF 35 sun protection. Full front zipper; 3 rear pockets. Primal Wear Clash Bike Jersey for men has a dropped rear hem for full coverage. Overstock.
